part.title: Introduction
part.para: gspell provides a flexible API to add spell checking to a GTK application. See the gspell home page.

refsect1.title: pkg-config name
refsect1.para: The pkg-config name of the gspell library is: gspell-&package_api_version;

refsect1.title: How to enable inline spell checking in a GtkTextView
refsect1.para: See the gspell_text_view_basic_setup() convenience function to quickly enable inline spell checking in a GtkTextView widget.

refsect1.title: How to enable inline spell checking in a GtkEntry
refsect1.para: See the gspell_entry_basic_setup() convenience function to quickly enable inline spell checking in a GtkEntry widget.
